* Frontier
  Airlines Inc before 2006. Year end March 31 treated as the year before.

** United and
  Continental are assumed as a single carrier beginning October 1, 2010

*** Note: In 2018, many airlines changed their accounting
  principles to conform to new standards, which lead to some significant
  changes in the numbers reported compared to previous years. For the sake of
  clarity, many airlines provided recast 2017 results in their 10-K reports
  that

can be found in
